item.title: Nextthing Chip Resurrection
item.description: I had to reset my NextThing Co C.H.I.P. because I had lost access. This turned out to be a lot more fun than expected. NextThing as a company is no more, their docs and github repo’s are gone. So how can we flash out Chip? First things first - there’s a docs mirror at http://chip.jfpossibilities.com/docs/chip.html#flash-chip-firmware Do not bother trying to get the official SDK up an running, because after hours of trying and finally getting it all to work, it still doesn’t work.
